Tutor Up Jodhpur The Event The People Activities Resources Sponsors

About

Tutor Up is the adult version of Code Club, providing free and friendly adult coding tuition.

The event is an open, friendly and supportive learning environment where anyone can learn or improve their digital skills for free.

Contact

  • Tutor Up Jodhpur
  • Meetup
  • Slack
  • Twitter
  • Email Us

Resources

Meetup

All of the Tutor Up Jodhpur events are organised through Meetup. If you're struggling to find information about the date, time, location or people at an event, check here first.

Slack

Tutor Up Jodhpur has a Slack workspace where you can chat, share files, ask questions and get help with problems in between Meetups. Follow the link to get an invitation.
